overview: Manasu Palike Mouna Raagam is a 2006 Telugu film produced by Dega Deva Kumar Reddy and directed by K. Nagabhushan starring Sneha and Vikramaditya. It was a women-oriented film and Sneha's performance was well appreciated. It was later dubbed to Tamil in the year 2009 as Yen Indha Mounam
title: Manasu Palike Mouna Raagam
